CustomField.description: Removed javascript calling from hyperlink function for winter 18
CustomField.formula: IF($User.UIThemeDisplayed="Theme4d", IF(RecordType.Name == 'Indirect Reseller Application', HYPERLINK($Label.Org_Base_URL+"/lightning/r/Report/"+$Label.IR_Application_Report_Id+"/view?fv0="+Id, "Report Link", "_blank]") ,HYPERLINK($Label.Org_Base_URL+"/lightning/r/Report/"+$Label.VAR_Application_Report_Id+"/view?fv0="+Id, "Report Link", "_blank]")), IF(RecordType.Name == 'Indirect Reseller Application', HYPERLINK("/"+$Label.IR_Application_Report_Id+"?pv0="+Id, "Report Link", "_blank") , HYPERLINK("/"+$Label.VAR_Application_Report_Id+"?pv0="+Id, "Report Link", "_blank")))
CustomField.label: Application Report
